title: Donation of an Air Conditioning Unit to Boso Health Centre
content: Stakeholders responded to a request from the staff of Boso Health Centre by donating an air conditioner for the Accounts Office. The District Director of Health Services received the donation on behalf of the facility and expressed gratitude to the donors.

title: World HIV/AIDS Day Activities
content: Staff across the district united to mark World HIV/AIDS Day, raising awareness about the disease to save lives.

title: District-wide Immunization Exercise
content: The Directorate carried out a successful immunization campaign across all sub-districts.
